alert.note: Alert for Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:33PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson County through 400 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Pine Junction, or 28 miles southwest of Denver, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... South Platte, Aspen Park, Pine Junction, Buffalo Creek, Conifer and Pine Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
